details.comment: ROM isn't clean and contains save data init from 0x60000 to the end.

details.comment1: This ROM is really 8 Mbits, it's not a mistake. And v03 is 4 Mbits, I confirmed it with redumps. But v05 is 4 Mbits again. So v05 could be a trimmed rom (in that case, no important data would be missing since game data ends at 0x60000, the rest is just padding). It would be cool to find and redump this v05 to really confirm the chip used, out of curiosity.
